docs.lead_paragraph: WOMEN live longer than men. Even to mention such a thing is flying in the face of all the ancient male lore about the "weaker sex," but there it is. The United States Public Health Service says so, and its vital statistics are more reliable than the self-satisfying maxims contrived by male wits.

headline.main: Proof That She Is the Stronger Sex; The 'little woman' resists overwork, budgets her energy, lives longer -- and creates a new problem.

docs.abstract: G Lawton article discusses problems caused by greater longevity of women than men

docs.lead_paragraph: City officials joined consumers and social and welfare workers yesterday at a noisy United States Department of Agriculture hearing to demand that the retail price of fluid class 1A milk be reduced beyond the price proposed by the milk industry.

headline.main: MILK CONSUMPTION SEEN CUT BY COST; Mustard, at Noisy Hearing Here, Asks Lower Prices -Murtagh Assails 'Monopoly'

docs.abstract: W Rogers holds hearing, NYC; consumer groups ask cuts; Comr Mustard calls producers and dealers proposals too high; Murtagh scores alleged monopoly; rows with Rogers
docs.snippet: City officials joined consumers and social and welfare workers yesterday at a noisy United States Department of Agriculture hearing to demand that the retail price of fluid class 1A milk be reduced beyond the price proposed by the milk industry.
